mean_en: having or showing the attitude of people who think they are better than other people :of or relating to people who are snobs
word_etyma: snobb=snob势利眼 + ish形容词后缀  → snobbish 势利眼的
sentence: He's so snobbish because he only makes friends with rich people.
sentence_trans: 他真是个势利眼，因为他只和有钱人交朋友。
